trailText: European commission president says key issues are level playing field and fisheries

headline: US allies welcome Biden presidency as major chance to tackle climate crisis
trailText: Macron and Johnson put climate at top of issues to confront together, as experts say window is still open to fulfil goals of Paris deal

headline: Trudeau: UK's lack of negotiating practice could delay Canada trade deal

headline: UK and Canada to trade on EU terms after Brexit transition
trailText: Conservative government says agreement paves the way for new bespoke deal with Canada

headline: 'Leave Nato': Justin Trudeau pranked by Russian duo posing as Greta Thunberg
trailText: Vovan and Lexus strike again, urging Canadian prime minister to introduce them to South Park characters Terrance and Phillip

headline: India summons Canada envoy as row deepens over Trudeau's protest remarks
trailText: Officials condemn ‘unacceptable interference’ from Canadian PM, who called clashes between police and farmers ‘concerning’

headline: The Guardian view on online child abuse: this horror must be faced
trailText: Editorial: New revelations about Pornhub should prompt immediate action. For leaders to voice ‘concern’, while doing nothing, is shameful

headline: Canada’s governor general resigns after report finds workplace harassment
trailText: Anonymous staff members say they were berated by Julie Payette to the point of tears, prompting an independent investigation

headline: 'We're double-dipping': Trudeau pressured to speed vaccine distribution amid Covax backlash
trailText: Government faces accusations it is taking Covid-fighting supplies intended for developing countries

headline: Majority of Canadians think royal family 'no longer relevant'
trailText: Tumultuous exit of Canada’s governor general prompts questioning of role and monarchy

headline: Chinese diplomat accuses Trudeau of making Canada 'running dog of US'
trailText: Clash is latest between China and Canada in recent months over Beijing’s treatment of its Uighur minority

headline: ‘Let this send a clear message’: world leaders react to Derek Chauvin verdict
trailText: Justin Trudeau welcomes jurors’ decisicion but warns that systemic racism still exists in the US
